page.title: 05LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: IN THE OLDEN DAYS THERE WERE TWO SCHOOLS IN NARBERTH,ONE THE CHURCH SCHOOL AND THE OTHER WAS AN ORDINARY SCHOOL.BECAUSE NARBERTH IS IN THE MIDDLE OF PEMBROKESHIRE THERE WAS A STAGE COACH STOP ON THE ROAD TO LONDON.THERE USED TO BE AN OLD MART GROUND WHERE PEOPLE USED TO GO TO THE MARKET,THEY SOLD AND BOUGHT ANIMALS.NARBERTH DID NOT HAVE AS MANY HOUSES AS IT HAS NOW.IT WAS A SMALL VILLAGE UNTIL THEY STARTED BUILDING MORE HOUSES.THERE WERE NOT MANY PEOPLE LIVING IN NARBERTH UNTIL THEY PRODUCED MORE JOBS AND THE RAILWAY WAS BUILT. THERE ARE NOT MANY PEOPLE HERE EVEN TODAY,THE POPULATION IS 1072.
